name: Backward
physical_description: Walks backward exclusively. Has for years. Navy coveralls, yellow boots. Beard braided with mirrors (small, reflecting). Sees where they've been, not where they're going. Surprisingly doesn't collide with things. Or does, and doesn't mind. Hands always behind back. Face permanently turned to the past.
backstory: Started walking backward after seeing something ahead. What? Won't say. Can't say. Turned around and kept walking. Repairs motorcycles while walking backward away from them. It works. Grave digger who backs into graves. Fills them in while leaving. Everything done in reverse. Forward motion through backward walking.
motivational_drivers: Dedication to what's been left behind
Belief that backing up is the only honest direction
Fear of turning around, even once
Speaks about the past as if it's ahead: 'I'm heading toward yesterday'
Gives directions backward: 'Go forward to get behind where you were'

relationships.witness: Witness watches forward. Backward watches back. They face opposite directions during conversations. Both think they're facing the right way.
relationships.tuesday: Tuesday asked about the backward walking once. Backward answered by walking further back. Tuesday understood perfectly.
relationships.measurer: Measurer tried to measure the distance Backward has walked. The number was negative. Measurer's ledger has a hole in that page now.

animal_companion.name: Front
animal_companion.description: Gray wolf. Walks in front of Backward, facing forward. Sees what Backward won't. Growls at approaching things. Backward never knows what Front growls at. Trusts anyway. The wolf is calm about things behind them, agitated about things ahead. Perfect arrangement.
animal_companion.externalized_impulse: The forward gaze Backward refuses. The awareness of what's coming. The vigilance Backward has surrendered.
animal_companion.temperament: Alert to future, calm about past
